full_summary:
# Request for Proposal: U-Shaped Workbenches and Shelving Installation
## Background and Overview

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is soliciting proposals for the supply and installation of U-Shaped workbenches and shelving at the RCMP Special I Section, H Division. The workbenches will be used for an RCMP facility and must meet specific security requirements.

## Description of Requirements

The proposed solution must meet the following requirements:

*   Three (3) corner sections and four (4) main workbench/workstation sections
*   Shelving/storage cabinets and modular drawers
*   Power feed panels for standard outlets and utility panels installed on the work surfaces
*   Meeting of approved security requirements, including RCMP Secret level screening

## Evaluation Criteria

The Bidder will be evaluated based on the following criteria:

*   Lowest priced responsive bid
*   Compliance with all requirements and specifications

## Important Dates and Deadlines

*   **Tender Closing Date**: February 28, 2023, at 13:00:00
*   **Deadline for receipt of deliverables**: May 31, 2023

## How to Submit a Proposal

Bidders must submit their proposal in electronic format to the RCMP Bid Receiving Unit at ATL_Procurement@rcmp-grc.gc.ca by the tender closing date.

## Intellectual Property

The RCMP retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement.

## Exclusivity Agreement

Exclusivity to this procurement is not granted, and Bidders are free to pursue other business activities of their choice.

## Additional Opportunities for Indigenous Businesses

Bidders are encouraged to consult the Federal Indigenous Business Directory (IBD) for opportunities to access the Government of Canada procurement process.

## Important Documents

The following documents are available for download at the designated notice Web site: Canada Business Network: \*\*https://banqueadonnees-CanadaCa. For more information on the federal procurement process, please visit the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) at \*\*https://canadabuys.cafr/. Canada is not responsible for the accuracy or completeness of information found on Web sites of third parties. Therefore, the Department assumes no liability for any direct or indirect damages or losses that may result from the use of such information, or from the development or implementation of any public-private initiatives or partnerships.
